member.name: T:RdlCore.Parsing.Word.FieldCodeExtractor
member.summary: Extracts field codes from Word documents

member.name: M:RdlCore.Parsing.Word.FieldCodeExtractor.ExtractFieldCodes(DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Packaging.WordprocessingDocument)
member.summary: Extracts all field codes from a Word document

member.name: M:RdlCore.Parsing.Word.FieldCodeExtractor.MergeFieldRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
MERGEFIELD\\s+(\\w+)
Options:
RegexOptions.IgnoreCase
Explanation:
○ Match a character in the set [Mm].
○ Match a character in the set [Ee].
○ Match a character in the set [Rr].
○ Match a character in the set [Gg].
○ Match a character in the set [Ee].
○ Match a character in the set [Ff].
○ Match a character in the set [Ii].
○ Match a character in the set [Ee].
○ Match a character in the set [Ll].
○ Match a character in the set [Dd].
○ Match a whitespace character atomically at least once.
○ 1st capture group.
○ Match a word character atomically at least once.

member.name: M:RdlCore.Parsing.Word.FieldCodeExtractor.SwitchRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
\\\\([#@*!])\\s*(?:"([^"]*)"|(\\S+))?
Explanation:
○ Match '\\'.
○ 1st capture group.
○ Match a character in the set [!#*@].
○ Match a whitespace character greedily any number of times.
○ Optional (greedy).
○ Match with 2 alternative expressions, atomically.
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match '"'.
○ 2nd capture group.
○ Match a character other than '"' atomically any number of times.
○ Match '"'.
○ 3rd capture group.
○ Match any character other than a whitespace character atomically at least once.
